3: I'm sure I don't have to introduce who we are collaborating with on this mission this time.
I'm used to this curse already.
I'll feel weird if that changes someday!
Haha! So will I! If I have to work with someone other than the Gray Ravens someday, I'm sure I'll be very disappointed!
It's time for me to show you how masterful I am now!
You were already masterful—at diving right in without thinking.
That wasn't diving in without thinking—it was bravery! Courage!
We seem to disagree on what some of those words mean.
I always feel like Lee gets to be a jerk because his frame is better designed and his database is bigger.

3: Do you think we were boring?
